attributes.action: to instruct the energy minister to reduce domestic energy prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Ofcom can bring legislation on the private phone companies to reduce costs or Ofcom will do it for them,then why cant the energy minister use legislation on the private energy companies to reduce prices which have already reduced by some 60%wholesale in the last 12 months.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
